comments.body: the medium-term goal that motivates this and the other pytables PR is that I _think_ we can type `queryables` as `Dict[str, Any]`, but it'll take a few steps to get there
this is the most non-trivial change.  It allows us to type the `kind` arg to `TermValue` as `str`, and in turn simplify some other parts of TermValue

        values = list(rhs)
